MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

English.Char_Desc_45: A utility for merging horizontal text.
English.Char_Desc_80: A utility for merging horizontal text and pick up distinct portion from multi-line text.
English.Char_Desc_450: StringEx is a utility for merging horizontal text.It can easily pick up distinct portion from multi-line text, and merge up to 4 columns a time with a small template.With StringEx's help,you can improve the efficiency of inputing large text which including much redundant content, and let you make less mistakes caused by hand inputing.
